title: Instructional Design Strategies Based on SWOT Analysis of LMS Adoption in Iranian Medical Schools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of educational technology and general concepts of LMS (Learning Management Systems)
context.additional_context: A program analyzing LMS implementation cases for pre-service/in-service mathematics teachers in digital device environments to strengthen instructional design capabilities

learning_goals: Learners can identify SWOT analysis factors to consider when introducing an LMS with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can specify at least three concrete strengths and weaknesses of an LMS in a given scenario.
Based on analysis results, learners can propose at least two applicable strategies for LMS-based math education design.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
